ModMetaData.name: Caravan Speed Upgrades
ModMetaData.author: SilkCircuit
ModMetaData.description: Caravan speed upgrades for when 'just walk faster' isn't cutting it. Equip your pawns with hiking poles, all-terrain boots, and walkie-talkies to increase caravan movement speed. Remember, you're only as fast as your slowest pawn—make sure to pack enough caravan gear for the whole crew.
